full_summary:
# Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)

**Reference Number**
: 81002984

**Tender Closing Date**
: 18 June 2024, 17:00 local time

**Public Note**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit an expression of interest for a potential lease of space that meets specific criteria. The PSPC is seeking a lease term of approximately 15 years, commencing on or about 1 April 2027, with an option to extend for one (1) additional year.

**Lease Components**

* Approximately 478 usable square meters (m2) of contiguous office space
* One (1) parking space
* Availability of the proposed space at least 35 weeks prior to the lease commencement date
* Compliance with PSPC's Standards for Leased Accommodation (a copy of which can be obtained from the contact listed in Section F)

**Location Criteria**

* The proposed space must be located within the City of Morden
* The space must be situated within an office or commercial type building, excluding buildings situated within heavy or medium industrial zoning and industrial type buildings with warehouse or manufacturing space
* Preference may be given to spaces with a highly visible storefront, located on a main road, and with direct pedestrian access from the street
* Fully accessible to persons with a disability
* Space for the installation of a bicycle rack
* Compatible dimensions for efficient design and use

**Evaluation Criteria**

The PSPC will evaluate potential offers based on the criteria outlined above, as well as other factors that may be considered relevant.

**Contact Information**

* Marlene Chow, Contracting Officer
* Email: [marlene.chow@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:marlene.chow@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (403) 605-5759

The PSPC may wish to visit or inspect the proposed space upon reasonable notice and may undertake a threat and risk assessment to assess potential threats to the security of the proposed space and the public. 

**Notice URL**:  https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38210/20240412-eoi-81002984-en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38210/20240412-eoi-81002984-fr.pdf (Francais)

Note: The provided contractor
